title.name: Crimson Delta Edge to Starburst
title.notes:
<div class="plainlist">
* Grants STB on hit
* Only comes out on hit
* Deals 20 damage with the input b,f+2
* Foot-side & Face-up & -5F from Not Starburst
* Head-side & Face-up & +0F during Starburst
</div>
